summary: Diff updates the SPA’s React app and HTML head to reference new static image/icon assets and adds a Contact-section prompt (per file summary). However, no new image files were added in the diff, so the requested 12 optimized images and generated favicon/icon assets cannot be confirmed as actually included in the build output.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 12 uploaded images as optimized static assets and place them throughout the existing single-page site (hero + service sections) with responsive/cropped layouts and alt text.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references generated assets and the summary mentions galleries, but the diff shows zero added files, and there is no evidence the 12 optimized images were actually added under static assets (e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated). Without asset additions, the acceptance criterion that all 12 images are included as static assets cannot be verified.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions galleries but not asset file additions)

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the website icon (favicon) with enhanced generated assets and update header/footer logo to match the new branding image.
missing_requirements.reason: index.html links to the new favicon and apple-touch-icon paths, and App.tsx references a new logo image path, but no generated icon/image files were added in the diff, so the new favicon/icon/logo assets themselves are not evidenced as present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact section still shows placeholders for Phone/Address/Business Hours, plus an English note asking the owner to provide phone, address, and business hours.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates an owner prompt alert was added, but the Contact section content is not visible in the truncated App.tsx snippet, so retention of the Phone/Address/Business Hours placeholders cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions “contact section with owner prompt alert”)

hallucinated_features.description: Global redesign of color palette/design tokens (warm industrial OKLCH) across light/dark mode.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on adding/using uploaded photos and updating favicon/logo plus a Contact prompt; it does not request a theme/token overhaul.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration changes (Inter font family and extended custom design tokens).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; appears as additional styling work beyond image/icon integration.

hallucinated_features.description: SEO-oriented page title change in HTML head.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest specifies favicon/icon updates and image placement, not SEO/title changes.
